question.questionText: Look at the 2 pictures of drops on a flat, waterproof surface. The drop on the left is soapy water and the drop on the right is plain water. What causes the soapy water to look like it does?

referenceAnswers.referenceAnswer: The surface tension is broken by the soap so the soapy water drop is flat.
